New Records: Drew Romo had a career-high 3 RBIs
Key Match Events: Jordan Beck had a go-ahead RBI single in the bottom of the eighth inning
Charlie Blackmon added two RBIs for the Rockies in the fourth inning with his fourth triple of the season
Anthony Santander hit his 39th home run of the season for the Orioles with a two-run, 437-foot shot to right field
Post-Match Reflections: Rockies manager Bud Black said, 'I want them aware of who we’re playing and what it means to the whole integrity of the season'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orioles starter Dean Kremer left the game in the fourth inning after being struck on his right forearm by a line drive
Orioles third baseman Ramón Urías also left the game early, exiting in the seventh after manning the bag on a feet-first slide from Rockies shortstop Ezequiel Tovar
Others: Rockies starter Ryan Feltner had a no decision, marking his 22nd consecutive start without a win
